## hpr2414 :: What's in my ham shack, part 1

 
Standard C510A/C510E, VHF / UHF analogue handset
https://www.eham.net/reviews/detail/2658
https://www.elkoba.com/en/wireless-radio-devices/standard-radio/standard-c-510.html
Standard Power Booster. I found it difficult to find information on this item
https://vobonus.appspot.com/Amateurfunk-Sendeempfnger/Booster-CPB-510-Von-Standard-Zur-Handfunke-C510E/252818765812
Baofeng UV-5R handset
https://www.amazon.co.uk/BaoFeng-UV-5R-136-174-400-480-Dual-Band-x/dp/B007HH6RR4
RSGB News
https://rsgb.org/main/news/
Retevis RT3 handset DMR (Digital Mobile Radio)
https://www.retevis.com/dmr-radio-rt3-uhf-1000ch-digital-two-way-radio-walkie-talkie
DMR (Digital Mobile Radio)
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_mobile_radio
https://www.m0pzt.com/blog/amateurs-guide-to-dmr/
Hacked firmware for Retevis RT3 & MD850 clones
https://github.com/travisgoodspeed/md380tools
https://github.com/travisgoodspeed/md380tools/wiki
Brandmiester Network
https://brandmeister.network/
Hytera PD365 handset DMR
https://hytera.co.uk/products/pd365
